ch0115_40_denji/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. I’m so glad I
ran into you.
ch0115_40_denji/0101_0701_02_10:
Today’s a new beginning. I can’t wait to see how
we’re going to spend it together.
ch0115_40_denji/7101_0701_01_10:
Taking on new challenges is one way to make
life a thrill.
ch0115_40_denji/7101_0701_02_10:
Together with Electivire, I’m resolving to find new
ways to have fun in battle!
ch0115_40_denji/7102_0701_01_10:
Electivire is a force of nature to be reckoned
with. Once I start talking about him, I just
can’t stop...
ch0115_40_denji/7102_0701_02_10:
Like, did you know that in terms of electrical
energy output, Electivire is one of the best of
all Electric-type Pokémon?
ch0115_40_denji/7102_0701_03_10:
Thanks to him, I have all the electricity I’ll ever
need to tinker around with machines.
ch0115_40_denji/7103_0701_01_10:
When I’m with Electivire, I feel really pumped
up and ready for anything!
ch0115_40_denji/7103_0701_02_10:
I’m starting to sound like Flint. Watch, now I’ll start
saying stuff like, “We’re burning hotter than ever!”
Or, “We’re on fire!”
ch0115_40_denji/7104_0701_01_10:
I love this outfit. It’s got a certain power to it,
like surging lightning.
ch0115_40_denji/7104_0701_02_10:
I’ve been having the most fun I’ve had since...I
don’t know when! And it’s all thanks to this outfit.
ch0115_40_denji/7104_0701_03_10:
I thought it might spark lots of inspiration for me
as well, but that hasn’t happened yet...
ch0115_40_denji/7105_0701_01_10:
Check out my new resolutions for this year:
electric battles with [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
And cutting-edge machine modifications!
ch0115_40_denji/7105_0701_02_10:
Hmm. Now that I think about it, I guess that’s
what I always do anyway...
ch0115_40_denji/1701_0701_01_10:
I was just hit by a flash of inspiration—to give
you this!
ch0115_40_denji/1701_0702_01_10:
If it comes in handy on your journey, that’d be
really awesome.
ch0115_40_denji/2501_0701_01_10:
Electivire and Luxray get along great. You’d almost
think they were siblings!
ch0115_40_denji/2501_0701_02_10:
When it comes to how they act with me, though,
it’s like they’re polar opposites.
ch0115_40_denji/2501_0701_03_10:
Luxray is really responsible, making sure to stop
me if I’m spending too much time tinkering
with machines.
ch0115_40_denji/2501_0701_04_10:
Electivire, on the other hand, gets right in there
with me and gets lost in the endless tinkering.
ch0115_40_denji/2501_0702_01_10:
The other day, Electivire got way too worked up
during a Pokémon battle. Luxray gave him a
good scolding.
ch0115_40_denji/2501_0702_02_10:
I felt kinda bad about that...but watching them
interact like that can be pretty fun sometimes.
ch0115_40_denji/2511_0701_01_10:
Since this outfit matches Electivire’s look, I feel a
real connection with him when I wear it—like we
share one heart and one mind.
ch0115_40_denji/2511_0701_02_10:
We’re so connected, in fact, that I feel like
we could let loose a surge of electricity at
any moment!
ch0115_40_denji/2511_0701_03_10:
Why are you looking at me like that? I was
just joking!
ch0115_40_denji/2511_0702_01_10:
The other day, I was walking through town, and
I started imagining taking apart all the machines
that I saw around me.
ch0115_40_denji/2511_0702_02_10:
It was fun, but maybe I get a little carried away
when I’m excited about something.
ch0115_40_denji/3001_0701_01_10:
Another day, huh? Let’s jump-start it and have
a blast!
ch0115_40_denji/3003_0701_01_10:
I’m resolved to try out some new renovations—
or rather, battle tactics—that haven’t been
done before!
ch0115_40_denji/3005_0701_01_10:
I wonder if the owner of this island would let me
light it up at night real bright, just like this outfit
of mine!
